issue.title: Add all users & Remove all users buttons are not bootstraped
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Add all users & Remove all users buttons are not bootstraped (see screenshot).
Class should be 
```

class="btn btn-mini"
```


**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Patched in my sandbox: /sandboxes/asit-vd/4.2.x/com_easysdi_core/src/site/views/resource/tmpl/default.php
